name: Jumping Up Again (prototype)
description:
SPACE            =  jump

UP/DOWN  =  move camera

TAB                  =  Trails

Q                       =  quit game

R                        =  reset

I wanted to make a very hard game like the games Getting Over It, Jump King and Pogostuck etc.

so this is what I came up with and I got the idea based on my favorite mobile game. it WAS my fav game. till I rage quit.

SO, if you tried the game, consider to give your opinion about the game. and should I complete finishing the game or not?
